r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $3.6M
  in 2019-2020 on contracts with Dufferin Construction Company. The average
  contract duration was 0.28 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $1.8M. The longest
  contract was 0.46 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $3.6M.
lookup_name: 'DUFFERIN CONSTRUCTION COMPANY'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '3.6M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2019-2020'
s431_number_of_contracts: '2'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '2'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '100%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '26%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '1'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '413.7K'
s424_mean_duration: '0.28'
s421_mean_contract_value: '1.8M'
s425_max_duration: '0.46'
s422_max_contract_value: '3.6M'
---
